LanguageData.BetterTimeFormatDesc: This setting changes the way the clock is represented in-game.\nYou can use H (Hours), M (Minutes), HH (Hours with Leading Zero), and MM (Minutes with Leading Zero).\nIf the twelve hour clock is enabled you can use N (Notation) to place the AM/PM.
LanguageData.BetterTimeFormat12hDesc: Changes the clock to be 12 hours using AM/PM (Enables the use of N in the format).
LanguageData.BetterTimeFormatAMDesc: This setting replaces the AM notation used with the 12 hours clock.
LanguageData.BetterTimeFormatPMDesc: This setting replaces the PM notation used with the 12 hours clock.
